name: XTreme Racing: Data Disks
description: XTreme Racing: Data Disks is an add-on for Xtreme Racing. The most prominent feature is the track editor which can be used to create new or modify existing courses, including graphics and sound effects. There are also 20 new tracks (12 races, 3 bonus and 5 deathmatch), three new cups, one new season and five new tile sets. Additionally included is the patch to upgrade the game to version 1.1.
publishedBy: Black Magic Software, Guildhall Leisure Services Ltd.
